Title: Increases the fine that may be imposed for violations of real estate licensing laws and provides for procedures in connection with nonsolicitation orders
Summary: Increases the fine that may be imposed for violations of real estate licensing laws and provides for procedures in connection with violations involving nonsolicitation orders and cease and desist zones; provides for publication of violations; directs the secretary of state to hold public hearings within cease and desist zones prior to their expiration and report to the legislature on the decision of whether or not to readopt the rule and reasons for such decision.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to fines and procedures in connection with misconduct by real estate brokers and salespersons
